summary: Completed frontend testing of new Teams & Roles documentation page. All features working correctly - page renders with all 7 sections, RoleCard components, WorkflowStep components, DocScreenshot placeholders, and navigation.

issues: Page title 'Teams & Roles Guide' is partially cut off by the sidebar navigation - minor overlap issue

passed_tests: Documentation hub shows Teams & Roles card with correct icon, description, and features
Navigation from hub to Teams page works via card click
Breadcrumb navigation 'Help & Documentation > Teams & Roles Guide' present
Sidebar navigation shows all 7 sections: Overview, Team Management, Roles & Permissions, Creating Custom Roles, Assigning Roles, Content Approval Workflow, Best Practices
All 7 main content sections render with correct IDs for anchor navigation
RoleCard components render for Creator (4 permissions), Manager (5 permissions), Admin (5 permissions)
Permission Categories table renders with Content, Approval, Team, Analytics, Settings categories
WorkflowStep components render for 5-step role creation process
DocScreenshot placeholders show 'Screenshot not available' with 'Capture Screenshot' buttons (3 total)
DocTip/Alert components render (14 total - info, tip, warning types)
Back to All Guides button present
Content Approval Workflow section shows 4-step workflow process
Best Practices section shows Role Design, Team Organization, Security subsections
context_for_next_testing_agent: Teams & Roles documentation page at /contentry/documentation/teams is fully functional. Screenshots are placeholders (expected - not yet captured). All components (RoleCard, WorkflowStep, DocScreenshot, DocTip, DocFeatureList) render correctly. Navigation between documentation hub and teams page works.
